zone.line: From me down, in the first Sabath stillness
Then sounded so presageful the clocktones fullness
And a prayer was a most ardent companion
Drew me thro wood & mead on forth to go
And under a thousand burning tears
Felt I to me a world uprise.
Theis song renews of youth the sprightly games
Of the spring feast the frank happiness:
Remembrance holds me now with childish feelings,
Of the last, the first step behind,
O sing forth, ye sweet Songsters of Heaven
The tear springs, the Earth has me again.
